General.Name: Global Health Limited
General.Description: Global Health Limited engages in the provision of healthcare services in India. The company primarily offers treatments in the areas of lung transplant, mother and child care, neonatology, URO-oncology, paediatric, pulmonology, oncology, orthopaedics, urology, endocrine surgery, gastroenterology, Psychiatry, surgical and radiation oncology, as well as ENT, blood bank, and chest related services. It also offers digestive and hepatobiliary sciences, musculoskeletal disorders and orthopedics, critical care and anesthesiology, endocrinology and diabetology, nephrology, obstetrics, dermatology, ophthalmology, dental, liver transplant, kidney, and various specializations, as well as ayurvedic medicine. The company operates a network of five hospitals in Gurugram, Delhi, Indore, Ranchi, Patna, and Lucknow under the Medanta brand. Global Health Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is based in New Delhi, India.
